document_data.name: Explosive Cascade
document_data.mainbody: '''''Explosive cascade''''' was a [[spell]] used by [[sorcerer]]s and [[wizard]]s.
document_data.Effects: When cast, this spell created a brilliant sphere of flame. This sphere bounced around the immediate area. Any creature who came into contact with it was burned. It gave off the equivalent illumination of a [[torch]].
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic]] components, the spell required a [[material component]]: a metal tube enclosed at one end stuffed with [[bat]] [[guano]], [[sulfur]], and [[copper]].
